headline.main: Debating the Bush Agenda, From Sea to Sea

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The Democratic leadership (news article, Feb. 28) continues to fight a divisive class war, bashing tax cuts ''for the rich'' and stirring the emotions of those whose feelings were hurt because their man lost an election. Behind these flames, the Democratic agenda is clear: increasing government power using the taxes we pay as working Americans.
abstract: Peter J Weldon letter charges Democratic leadership fights divisive class war by bashing Pres Bush's tax cut proposals as 'for the rich'
